metadata.description: Seed variety equivalency and substitution rules for rice varieties in the Philippines. All ratios are 1:1 pending agronomic validation.

substitutes.name: US-88
substitutes.reason: Similar yield characteristics and maturity period

instructions.english: US-88 is a proven variety with similar characteristics to Jackpot. Apply same cultivation practices.
instructions.tagalog: Ang US-88 ay isang proven variety na may katulad na katangian sa Jackpot. Gamitin ang parehong pamamaraan ng pagtatanim.

instructions.english: TH-82 is suitable for most growing conditions. Maintain same planting density.
instructions.tagalog: Ang TH-82 ay angkop sa karamihan ng kondisyon ng pagtatanim. Panatilihin ang parehong planting density.

substitutes.name: RH-9000
substitutes.reason: Compatible variety with good yield potential

instructions.english: RH-9000 offers good yield potential. Follow standard cultivation practices.
instructions.tagalog: Ang RH-9000 ay nag-aalok ng magandang ani. Sundin ang standard na pamamaraan ng pagtatanim.

instructions.english: Lumping-143 is a traditional variety known for consistency. Use same seed rate.
instructions.tagalog: Ang Lumping-143 ay traditional variety na kilala sa consistency. Gamitin ang parehong seed rate.

substitutes.name: LP-296
substitutes.reason: Alternative variety suitable for local conditions

instructions.english: LP-296 is suitable for local conditions. Apply recommended seeding rate.
instructions.tagalog: Ang LP-296 ay angkop sa lokal na kondisyon. Gamitin ang recommended seeding rate.

substitutes.name: Jackpot
substitutes.reason: Similar yield characteristics and maturity period

instructions.english: Jackpot is a proven variety with similar characteristics to US-88.
instructions.tagalog: Ang Jackpot ay proven variety na may katulad na katangian sa US-88.

substitutes.name: TH-82
substitutes.reason: Excellent alternative with proven track record

instructions.english: TH-82 has excellent track record. Maintain same cultivation practices.
instructions.tagalog: Ang TH-82 ay may magandang track record. Panatilihin ang parehong pamamaraan.

instructions.english: RH-9000 provides reliable performance. Follow standard practices.
instructions.tagalog: Ang RH-9000 ay nagbibigay ng reliable performance. Sundin ang standard practices.

instructions.english: Lumping-143 shows good adaptation. Use same seed rate.
instructions.tagalog: Ang Lumping-143 ay may magandang adaptation. Gamitin ang parehong seed rate.

instructions.english: LP-296 is suitable for local conditions.
instructions.tagalog: Ang LP-296 ay angkop sa lokal na kondisyon.

instructions.english: US-88 has similar performance to TH-82.
instructions.tagalog: Ang US-88 ay may katulad na performance sa TH-82.

instructions.english: Jackpot offers comparable yield potential.
instructions.tagalog: Ang Jackpot ay nag-aalok ng comparable yield potential.

instructions.english: RH-9000 provides consistent results.
instructions.tagalog: Ang RH-9000 ay nagbibigay ng consistent results.

instructions.english: Lumping-143 is a reliable traditional variety.
instructions.tagalog: Ang Lumping-143 ay reliable traditional variety.

instructions.english: LP-296 is suitable for local adaptation.
instructions.tagalog: Ang LP-296 ay angkop sa lokal na adaptation.

instructions.english: TH-82 has similar characteristics to RH-9000.
instructions.tagalog: Ang TH-82 ay may katulad na katangian sa RH-9000.

instructions.english: US-88 offers proven performance.
instructions.tagalog: Ang US-88 ay nag-aalok ng proven performance.

instructions.english: Jackpot is compatible with good yield potential.
instructions.tagalog: Ang Jackpot ay compatible na may magandang yield potential.

instructions.english: Lumping-143 is a traditional alternative.
instructions.tagalog: Ang Lumping-143 ay traditional alternative.

instructions.english: LP-296 is suitable for local conditions.
instructions.tagalog: Ang LP-296 ay angkop sa lokal na kondisyon.

instructions.english: TH-82 offers modern characteristics with better yield.
instructions.tagalog: Ang TH-82 ay nag-aalok ng modern characteristics na may mas magandang ani.

instructions.english: US-88 is a proven variety with good results.
instructions.tagalog: Ang US-88 ay proven variety na may magandang resulta.

instructions.english: Jackpot is a good alternative variety.
instructions.tagalog: Ang Jackpot ay magandang alternative variety.

instructions.english: RH-9000 is a compatible substitute.
instructions.tagalog: Ang RH-9000 ay compatible substitute.

instructions.english: LP-296 is a similar traditional variety.
instructions.tagalog: Ang LP-296 ay katulad na traditional variety.

instructions.english: Lumping-143 has similar traditional characteristics.
instructions.tagalog: Ang Lumping-143 ay may katulad na traditional characteristics.

instructions.english: TH-82 is a modern alternative with good yield.
instructions.tagalog: Ang TH-82 ay modern alternative na may magandang ani.

instructions.english: US-88 is a proven variety.
instructions.tagalog: Ang US-88 ay proven variety.

instructions.english: Jackpot is a good substitute.
instructions.tagalog: Ang Jackpot ay magandang substitute.

instructions.english: RH-9000 is a compatible variety.
instructions.tagalog: Ang RH-9000 ay compatible variety.

notes.conversionRatio: All seed substitutions use 1:1 ratio (1kg = 1kg) pending agronomic validation
notes.confidenceScores: Confidence scores (0.80-0.92) are placeholder values based on general popularity and should be validated with actual field data from PhilRice/DA-BAR
notes.instructions: Farmer instructions are general guidelines and should be reviewed by agricultural technicians
notes.validation: This knowledge base requires validation and refinement based on actual agronomic research data
